mapper.insert:
insert into t_u_order_detail
cancel_time,
id,
createtime,
delete_user,
updater,
creator,
deletetime,
is_delete,
updatetime,
order_id,
service_item_id,
order_time,
appointment_time,
member_id,
order_status,
send_member,
rider_id,
cancel_role,
cancel_member,
order_over_time,
VALUES
#{cancel_time},
#{id},
#{createtime},
#{delete_user},
#{updater},
#{creator},
#{deletetime},
#{is_delete},
#{updatetime},
#{order_id},
#{service_item_id},
#{order_time},
#{appointment_time},
#{member_id},
#{order_status},
#{send_member},
#{rider_id},
#{cancel_role},
#{cancel_member},
#{order_over_time},
mapper.update: update t_u_order_detail set is_delete=1,deletetime=sysdate where id=#{id}

update t_u_order_detail
cancel_time=#{cancel_time},
createtime=#{createtime},
delete_user=#{delete_user},
updater=#{updater},
creator=#{creator},
deletetime=#{deletetime},
is_delete=#{is_delete},
updatetime=#{updatetime},
order_id=#{order_id},
service_item_id=#{service_item_id},
order_time=#{order_time},
appointment_time=#{appointment_time},
member_id=#{member_id},
order_status=#{order_status},
send_member=#{send_member},
rider_id=#{rider_id},
cancel_role=#{cancel_role},
cancel_member=#{cancel_member},
order_over_time=#{order_over_time},
where id=#{id}
